edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Dylan Nguyen This Player class will contain parameters that will define the player's status, upgrade status, position, and number of lives. In addition, the methods contained within the class will give the player actions (look, shoot, move, pick up items) as well as reactions (death, shield, radar, new bullet).
